page.title: 18LOCAL INDUSTRY
page.content: Although Comberton is a small village there are many forms of employment. There are several different general stores. For example Post Office, Butchers and the village shops. As well as these, there are other places of work in the area. For Example: {Glasshouse Company {Sanders Nurserys {Westside Joinery {Jones Haulage {Comberton Antiques {Bubbles Hair Stylists {Two Garages { Jancia Furniture Makers Although there are these few places of employment, most people travel 6 miles to Cambridge to work. Unemployment is Low in this area.
